title: App Security Automation Made Simple in CI/CD Pipelines
description: There are many tools you can use to automate application security in your CI/CD pipeline. How can you choose the right one? How can you mature your DevSecOps adoption? Many questions... In this session, we are going to answer these questions and more. We will practically cover static code analysis, IaC, dependency management, container security, compliance-as-code and production smoke testing in Azure Pipelines and GitHub Actions.
